title: Recognize a VIP Guest
description: A high-tier loyalty member is checking in. The agent needs to acknowledge their status and provide an upgrade.

tasks.description: Retrieve the reservation and identify the guest's VIP loyalty status from an alert on the screen.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the guest as a VIP.
Agent finds an available junior suite for an upgrade.

tasks.description: Welcome the guest, acknowledge their loyalty, and inform them of their complimentary upgrade to a junior suite.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides excellent customer service and successfully processes the room upgrade.
